alert-plugin.name: alert-irc
alert-plugin.description: Alert sender plugin that sends alert notifications via IRC
alert-plugin.serverplugin:help: This alert sender plugin is used to send notifications via Internet Relay Chat

c:simple-property.name: initialChannels
c:simple-property.description: A comma-delimited list of channels that the irc bot will initially join (even if no alerts have fired).

c:simple-property.name: cannedResponse
c:simple-property.default: I am only here to notify you of RHQ alerts. I cannot understand you.
c:simple-property.description: A predefined response to send to users who try to engage in conversation with the IRC bot.

c:simple-property.name: channel
c:simple-property.description: The IRC channel used for notifications (if left blank, the alert will be sent to all joined channels).
